import math

def minimum_operations_to_equalize_candies(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, candies) = case
        total_candies = sum(candies)
        div = total_candies * N
        div = math.ceil(div)
        deficit = div * N - total_candies
        for candy in candies:
            if candy > div:
                deficit += candy - div
        results.append(deficit)
    return results

import math

def minimum_operations_to_equalize_candies(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, candies) = case
        total_candies = sum(candies)
        div = total_candies // N
        div = math.ceil(div)
        deficit = div * N - total_candies
        for candy in candies:
            if candy > div:
                deficit += candy - div
        results.append(deficit)
    return results

def minimum_operations_to_equalize_candies(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:

        total_candies = sum(candies)

def minimum_operations_to_equalize_candies(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, candies) = case
        total_candies = sum(candies)
        div = total_candies / N
        div = math.ceil(div)
        deficit = div * N - total_candies
        for candy in candies:
            if candy <= div:
                deficit += candy - div
        results.append(deficit)
    return results

import math

def minimum_operations_to_equalize_candies(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, candies) = case
        total_candies = sum(candies)
        div = total_candies / N
        div = math.ceil(div)
        deficit = div * N - total_candies
        for candy in candies:
            if candy != div:
                deficit += candy - div
        results.append(deficit)
    return results

import math

def minimum_operations_to_equalize_candies(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, candies) = case
        total_candies = sum(candies)
        div = total_candies / N
        div = math.ceil(div)
        deficit = div * N - total_candies
        for candy in candies:
            if candy > div:
                deficit -= candy - div
        results.append(deficit)
    return results

import math

def minimum_operations_to_equalize_candies(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, candies) = case
        total_candies = sum(candies)
        div = total_candies / N
        div = math.ceil(div)
        deficit = div * N - total_candies
        for candy in candies:
            if candy > div:
                deficit += candy + div
        results.append(deficit)
    return results

import math

def minimum_operations_to_equalize_candies(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, candies) = case
        total_candies = sum(candies)
        div = total_candies / N
        div = math.ceil(div)
        deficit = div * N - total_candies
        for candy in candies:
            if candy > div:
                deficit += candy * div
        results.append(deficit)
    return results
